extendedIngredients.name: plum tomatoes
extendedIngredients.originalString: 7 large plum tomatoes (2 lb.), each cut lengthwise into 3 slices

extendedIngredients.name: skim milk mozzarella cheese
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1-1/3 cups KRAFT 2% Milk Shredded Mozzarella Cheese

extendedIngredients.name: sourdough bread
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1 sourdough bread baguette (10 oz.), cut diagonally into 20 slices

extendedIngredients.name: vinaigrette dressing
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1/2 cup KRAFT Lite Balsamic Vinaigrette Dressing

extendedIngredients.name: yellow squash
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1 small yellow squash, cut lengthwise into 10 slices

recipes.title: Grilled Vegetable Bruschetta

winePairing.pairingText: Sparkling rosé and Sparkling Wine are great choices for Fingerfood. If you're serving a selection of appetizers, you can't go wrong with these. Both are very food friendly and complement a variety of flavors. You could try Bellissima Sparkling rosé. Reviewers quite like it with a 4.5 out of 5 star rating and a price of about 24 dollars per bottle.

productMatches.title: Bellissima Sparkling Rose
productMatches.description: This is an elegant, bright rosé, with hints of strawberry and grapefruit, and a soft, persistent foam. Uncorked at the very last minute, Bellissima Sparkling Rosé pairs perfectly with smoked salmon, shellfish, and seafood hor d’oeuvres such as tuna tartare, sushi, and sashimi.

recipes.instructions: Heat grill to medium heat.                                            Brush dressing onto both sides of bread slices.                                              Cut squash slices crosswise in half; place on bread.  Top with remaining ingredients.                                              Grill 6 to 8 min. or until cheese is melted.

steps.step: Brush dressing onto both sides of bread slices.
Cut squash slices crosswise in half; place on bread.  Top with remaining ingredients.
Grill 6 to 8 min. or until cheese is melted.
